title: Can't buy champions in the new client
body: I made a new account and wanted to buy a 450 IP champion, but on the beta client it tells me I don't have enough IP for a new champion. This prompted me to switch to the old client in order to buy the champion which is just a hassle.

replies.body: I have that same Problem, too. I think i should have to quit LoL if this isn't going to be fixed...
Yep, ever since the new client update I can't buy any champions and I now have 15k IP that I can only spend on runes...
Every time I try to buy a champion it says NOT YET IMPLEMENTED   what does it mean????????{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
same here ..  i still dont know why riot is not solving this and forcing us to use new client which is super buggy

Yeah, I was having the same issue with "Not yet Implemented", and couldn't purchase a new champ with my IP from the collection/champion screen.
I went into the store instead, and was able to purchase it there directly, and it worked.
I hope this helps. GLHF.
thx buddy  .. can buy champ[ion from store ..
Why is this not fixed yet? What is the timeline on this bug being fixed?
Are you still experiencing this after hopping over to the Legacy Client or has this been resolved?
I still cant buy any champs
I don't know if this thread is dead, but the problem extends to the 1700 ip mystery champion shard in the accessories tab of the shop.

> [{quoted}](name=Drunk Turtle Wax,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JPHw32VP,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-12-11T03:50:30.675+0000)
>
> I don't know if this thread is dead, but the problem extends to the 1700 ip mystery champion shard in the accessories tab of the shop.

This for me right now, and has happened alot. normally when i JUST get enough ip to purchase then make the attempt after the game, reset game and still says i have insufficient funds
So you still experience issues purchasing the mystery champ shard when using the Legacy Client?
Hey, i suffer from the same issue (Europe West), i have 6872 IPs but the store says I don't have enough IP for a 6300 Champion (it does let me buy 4800,3150...)

Try hopping into the Legacy Client from the Login screen and make your purchase from the store. This should resolve the issue:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this worked for you!
The legacy client won't launch. And it's a problem on your end. I'd tend to this before the new Warwick comes out... Just saying it's off putting.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JPHw32VP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-05T04:16:04.463+0000)
>
> Are you still experiencing this after hopping over to the Legacy Client or has this been resolved?

I'm experience this exact problem, but only with mystery champ shards.  Sometimes, when I have more than needed 1700 ip, it does not allow me to purchase them saying I do not have enough.  However, sometimes, after that has happened, earning more IP fixes the issue.  The issue keeps coming back, however.
I have a question. If you can’t get points to buy champs after game how are you going to buy? Does this mean just pay money to buy riot points?
The new update has a problem. If you can’t get any more points after game how are u going to buy champs? Does this mean to just buy riot points
go to the store page in the launcher

PROBLEM SOLVED!! 
we do not know when will they fix it but u can go to store not collection and u can buy from there :D
I can buy from the store but not from my collection. Hope that helps someone.
lmao that was actually it , thx man

The new client does not allow me to purchase champs in "collection" because of not yet implemented.
I solved this by going to STORE next to your Riot points. it let me unlock champ
I have the same problem, I just saved up enough to buy Varus (4800), and when I click the buy button, it says "Not Yet Implemented".

yeah well same and Riot doesnt seem to be helping us...

{{champion:17}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
hey guys click store in the top right hand side of the client hope this helps

I can't buy any champions now that i've been forced to use the new client either....

Like wtf
Im also there its says not yet implemented.....

The updated client may not be showing your accurate amount.  Try using the legacy client for this to get it updated:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!

sorry to zombie the thread, but I'm also running into this issue. I'm about 90% sure it's just not showing the right amount but unfortunately, the legacy client is no longer an option. Do you think you guys could add a check when you launch the client for something like {if displayed ip =/= actual ip displayed ip = actual ip?}
Edit: My Uncle, brother, and dad also seem to be having this problem >>
Ya the same thing is happening to me

I haven't been able to buy a champion using the right amount of IP since the new client. if I want to buy a 6300 I need at least 7200 ip. Right now it won't let me buy a 4800 champ and I have 5400 ip. this is really frustrating.
every time i try to but a champion they say "not yet implemented" and i don't want to open the legacy launch it is just a waste of time so can somebody tell me what is going on with league

yo i kinda have the same problem just where as when i try to buy a champ in the new client it says "not yet implemented" its kinda annoying but i can switch over to the old client (which takes a shit ton of time) and but champs there but just wanna know why the hell that happens and if Riot just started a new client without it being complete (being able to buy champs is kinda important) but anyway the new client is pretty good and looks smooth in all other ways so yeah have a good time!

same thing happen on me and my friend
{{champion:24}}  buff jax plz
me to I have more than 7k IP but roit won't let me buy a champion or even a 2k rune
if you bye a 450 champ sometimes it glitches and doesnt show it took the money

I really want to purchase{{champion:29}} , too. However, I am experiencing the same issue where I have 3339 IP, but it says "not enough RP/IP" when I hover over the champion in the store. When I click on the champion, the unlock button is grayed out. This whole issue is happening on the new client, and I (and many others) would appreciate if you looked into the issue. Thank you!
Hello I have a problem with the new launcher c that I absolutely did not buy champion the message is "not yet activated" while i have asser de pi thank you very much helped
I can't buy 4800 champions on the new client. plz help
I am having the same Issue im trying to buy{{champion:29}}
Ya I supposedly have 6410 or something like that, but I can't buy any 6300 champs. Does the new client not sense when you earn IP?
I agree, I have the same problem. I have 6461 Ip and I want to buy Vi, but it won't let me.
i have same issue, if you want you can buy champion from shop with your IP.

It's just weird though. it will let me buy some champions that cost a lot less than I have but not all ones I have enough for. 

So I haven't bought anything with IP for a week and have 5091 ip for around 1 day and wanted to buy zyra for 4800. it won't let me but it will let me buy lux for 3150. I launched legacy client and it let me buy zyra. It doesn't seem to know how much ip i really have on beta client.
Same thing is happening to me but i dont have the old client anymore  and i dont want to redownload it
Just go to your riot games folder and open lol.launcher , that will open your old client.
